articles.title: Adidas backtracks on Black Lives Matter design opposition - BBC
articles.description: The firm previously said a Black Lives Matter design would create confusion with its famous three-stripe mark.
articles.content:
Adidas says it is withdrawing a request to the US Trademark Office to reject a Black Lives Matter (BLM) application for a trademark featuring three parallel stripes.
The sportwear giant did not give… [+2743 chars]
